OverviewÔÉÅ

This repo contains the source files for the AS2650-2 processor, as submitted to GFMPW-1. The AS2650-2 is a general-purpose 8-bit CPU based on and binary compatible with the Signetics 2650 CPU. However, it contains custom instruction set extensions to make it even more powerful, as well as various I/O devices on-die.
